title: Rebel Inc: Escalation Directly Download
description:
From the creator of ‘Plague Inc: Evolved’ comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation. In Rebel Inc: Escalation, the war is ‘over’ but we all know that doesn’t mean anything. In order to stabilise a war-torn country, you need to balance competing military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping a deadly insurgency from seizing power Planet of Lana
Following on from the global mega hit ‘Plague Inc.’ with over 160 million players, Rebel Inc: Escalation offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency. It has received acclaim from international development experts and was even featured at a major international peace conference
